Kube at FOSDEM 2017

If you want to hear more about Kube come to FOSDEM over the upcoming weekend.

You can find out more on the Kolab and KDE booth, and there will be a talk on Sunday 5. February, at 16:20 in Room K.4.401.

See you there!
